blogPost.title: Honeybees are at constant risk of diseases sweeping through their hives. So, queen bees vaccinate their unlaid eggs with fragments of proteins from disease-causing pathogens https://t.co/w5KXLDTrYx
blogPost.author: The Economist

localize.full_text: 蜜蜂时刻面临着疾病席卷蜂巢的风险。因此，蜂王用致病病原体的蛋白质碎片为未产卵接种疫苗https://t.co/w5KXLDTrYx。
